import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import sampleIcon from '../../assets/images/default.png' import { fetchApiData, storeApiData } from "../../api/api"; const CompanyApplierItem = ({index, id, title, description, document, status, applicationDate, profile, company, job}) => { return (

{title}

{company.name}

{/* {status} */}
) } export default CompanyApplierItem
